amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions lifting the current requirement that a fee or tax be paid to the U.S. Government on foreign sales of products developed under Federal contract in order to recoup development costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of September 12 as amendment No. 3, to strike a provision of the bill that lifts the current law requirement that a fee must be paid to the United States Government on foreign sales of products developed under government contract to recoup these development costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 259 (Roll no. 662).
